overview:
Curtis is a Supply Chain Consultant working for Intermountain Healthcare in Salt Lake City, Utah.

For this position, he strategically manages pharmaceutical contracting and spending for Intermountain’s 23 hospitals and more than 150 clinics. He also collaborates with physicians, pharmacists, and the pharmacy and therapeutics committee to ensure that the contracting and negotiation of products are in accordance with Intermountain’s needs, clinical standards, and formulary guidelines. Prior to this position, Curtis was a finance analyst for Intermountain Healthcare.

Curtis received a bachelor of science degree in finance from the University of Utah in Salt Lake City. He followed this with a master’s degree in healthcare management and business administration from Western Governors University in Salt Lake City.

As a member of the University of Utah football team, Curtis was honored twice by the Mountain West Conference as an outstanding scholar athlete. In 2000, he was selected as 1 of 10 student athletes in the State of Utah to be named as an outstanding athlete/scholar/leader by the National Football Foundation.

He is a Certified Microsoft Application Specialist for Microsoft Excel.

Curtis’ specialties include: Contract negotiation, pharmacy management, analysis, reporting (Cognos, Crystal, and Access reports), team leadership
